noun.definition: A statement or event that indicates a possible or impending danger, problem, or other unpleasant situation.

verb.definition: Inform someone in advance of an impending or possible danger, problem, or other unpleasant situation.
verb.example: His father warned him of the danger.

verb.definition: Give (someone) advice to beware of something.
verb.example: I warned you not to go there.

usage_examples: The government issued a health warning.
